programme.title: Leverage: Redemption S2
programme.desc: The team uses the true story of a World War I P.O.W. escape to free an innocent man framed by a pair of dirty cops.

programme.title: The Good Karma Hospital S2
programme.desc: Ruby is now settled in India and is deepening her understanding of the country. Her working relationship with Dr. Gabriel Varma turns into something more. Meanwhile, Lydia's relationship with Greg hits an obstacle and they begin to wonder what the future has in store for them.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: All Stars
programme.desc: AGT: All-Stars is an expansion of the original AGT that features "fan favorites, finalists, viral sensations" and even winners of past AGT seasons. The upcoming show could even include acts from other versions of AGT around the world, bringing some fresh new faces to an already excited fan base.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: Monster Jam
programme.desc: Professional monster truck drivers compete against each other in races and freestyle competitions around the world to win the top prize.

programme.title: Stars In Style S8
programme.desc: Stars in Style cover all the important looks and shapes from the biggest celebs. The hottest trends in fashion, beauty and lifestyle with expert tips and opinions.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Mat Yoyo S2
programme.desc: The uniqueness of Mat Yoyo is the experiential learning through everyday things found around The 2 adorable cats, Yoyo and Yaya will ask many questions which trigger a learning journey or discovery. They will be joined by Kim Wakerman & Joakim Gomez as their big 'sister' & 'brother'.

programme.title: Club M.A.G.I.C
programme.desc: Miss P has invited a few animals to an animal tea party, but she gets a huge surprise when her Positive Agents bring their stuffed animals to the party instead! Miss P takes the opportunity to get her agents to find out more about animals and what can be learned from them. The LETTER OF THE DAY is 'g' and the words are globe, guitar and grapes.

programme.title: Tell Us Eddy!
programme.desc: Why do flowers bloom? Why does it rain? Let's answer children's various questions about natural phenomena in a fun and easy way!

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Paula & Pals S2
programme.desc: When Tim got hurt and his hand is in a cast, Paula and Billy try their best to cheer him up, even though he's not feeling it.

programme.title: Paula & Pals S2
programme.desc: Billy doesn't want to play football with the others but he might be too hesitant in speaking his mind and is forced to play with them.

programme.title: Moominvalley S3
programme.desc: In the upcoming season, the quirky residents from all around the valley come to the Moomin family with their problems and questions, and together they harness to power of tolerance, kindness and caring to restore harmony to Moominvalley.

programme.title: Mondo Yan
programme.desc: The world has fallen into chaos and is now a stinky land of toxic cesspools and monstrous mutants, called the Chou World, run by the nasty villain Negu. High above, on top of ancient abandoned skyscrapers, a beautiful new yet fragile and harmonious world has risen: the Yan World. Protected by three eccentric Elders, three young apprentice misfits have been chosen to learn their secrets and protect this peaceful and idyllic place!

programme.title: Supermart Science
programme.desc: The supermarket. Do you you know its the source of invigorating, refreshing and exciting science experiments? Supermart Science is a weekly science challenge for children. Presented by 2 zany characters, Helix and Atom Adam, this series makes science experiments, fun, easy and accessible. Using day to day household items that may be found easily at the local supermart, each week, 2 teams face off to shop and build their science challenge. Who will reign supreme?

programme.title: Oddbods S1
programme.desc: The unique and quirky gang of Fuse, Newt, Pogo, Bubbles, Jeff, Zee and Slick laugh, trick and trip their way through life.

programme.title: Oddbods S1
programme.desc: The unique and quirky gang of Fuse, Newt, Pogo, Bubbles, Jeff, Zee and Slick laugh, trick and trip their way through life.

programme.title: Totally Spies S1
programme.desc: Three teenage girls from Beverly Hills attempt to balance their lives as high school (later university) students with their undercover work as super-spies, battling an array of bizarre criminals!

programme.title: Ultraman Z
programme.desc: Ultraman Z, the newest addition to the Intergalactic Defense Force, battles with evil forces that spread across the universe. He goes after the monster Genegarg to save Earth from destruction.

programme.title: Cinderella And The Little Sorcerer
programme.desc: When Prince Alex is trapped in the body of a mouse, Ella and her friends set off on a journey to find the magic that can change him back. On a journey that tests fate itself, they discover that friendship is the most powerful cure of all.

programme.title: Groom My Room Too S2
programme.desc: Move over adults! It's time for kids to have their own makeover series! In Groom My Room Too, catch kids as they take charge and make their dream bedrooms a reality! Each week, one lucky kid gets to transform their room from bland to grand! But it won't be easy! Kids will have to come up with their room designs, ship, decorate and lead their room groomers to finish the makeover on time and on budget!

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Singapore Recipes For Life
programme.desc: Chef Chris makes his Grandma's "lemper udang", sticky rice with a kerisik and dried shrimp. Kyle meets the Queen of Lemper (Ratu Lemper), Carol Aliya who challenges him to roll some out, but not before he and Chris have a spot of BJJ with her family. Next we meet Melissa Sidek, who owns 50 kebayas, whose SG Recipe for Life is to celebrate it. She and her "Kebaya Queens" hang out at Ratianah's Boutique, filled with rich heritage designs.

programme.title: Going From Broke S1
programme.desc: Dan Rosensweig, CEO of student services business Chegg, meets millennials with big dreams but are swimming in debt. Together, Rosensweig and his team advise and guide the subject of each episode to turn their financial situation around and move toward freedom from debt and student loans.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby S2
programme.desc: In this Christmas special, Giles and Monica travel to Kulm Hotel, St Moritz. This Swiss Alpine hotel was the birthplace of winter tourism more than 150 years ago. The Kulm's owner, Johannes Badrutt, made a bet with summer guests that if they returned in the winter and didn't enjoy themselves he would pay for their stay. The guests stayed for the season - and a new industry of winter leisure and sports was born.

programme.title: Clash Of The Cover Bands S1
programme.desc: Two bands of similar musical genre will go head-to-head over the course of two rounds to see which band has the most entertaining cover performance, with a chance to win a cash prize and bragging rights.

programme.title: Shang-Chi And The Legend Of The Ten Rings
programme.desc: Shang-Chi, the master of weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.

programme.title: 养生出大招
programme.desc: 喝绿茶可以解腹胀？饭后水果一定好消化？这集养生出大招，医师来接招，逐一解开民间消化迷思，原来饭后吃太多寒凉水果会造成脾胃虚寒，反而导致消化不良；不如跟着医师学习按摩消化穴位，饭后揉一揉，肚子不难受；节目里陆续出招，陈皮泡水喝，消化才有效，所以大伙儿别再继续喝绿茶伤脾胃啦！另外，医师现场分享民间的古老消化大招，把陈皮制成陈皮油，涂抹腹部后，腹胀不再有！ 师傅出奇招，模仿动物才能帮助消化？对，饭后散步不能保证马上促进消化，但模仿一种动物的姿势却能促进肠胃的消化功能，简单的原地晃晃腰腹，马上除胀气。这只动物到底.
